channel.title: Posts on KLOPOTENKO
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on KLOPOTENKO

item.title: CHEESE DUMPLINGS WITH HONEY-CREAM SAUCE
item.description: SIMPLE AND DELICIOUS BREAKFAST: HOW TO MAKE CHEESE DUMPLINGS WITH HONEY-CREAM SAUCE INGREDIENTS 5 eggs 200 g / 1 cup sugar 180 g / 1.5 cups all-purpose flour 1/2 tsp baking soda 400 g / 14 oz peaches (about 2-4 peaches) 10 g / 1tbsp butter (for greasing the pan) SHARLOTKA WITH PEACHES: DIRECTIONS Step 1 Place all of the ingredients for the sharlotka with peaches on the kitchen counter.

item.title: HAMULA (APPLE COOKIES)
item.description: INGREDIENTS 5 eggs 200 g / 1 cup sugar 180 g / 1.5 cups all-purpose flour 1/2 tsp baking soda 400 g / 14 oz peaches (about 2-4 peaches) 10 g / 1tbsp butter (for greasing the pan) SHARLOTKA WITH PEACHES: DIRECTIONS Step 1 Place all of the ingredients for the sharlotka with peaches on the kitchen counter. Rinse the 5 eggs under running water, pat them dry, and gently separate the yolks from the whites.
